Well-stocked shelves will encourage her customers to buy from her instead of going to other places. Her profit will sustain the needs of her family, like paying for food, school fees of her children and basic household bills like electricity and water.

loans.use: to buy candies, biscuits, seasoning, shampoo, canned goods, noodles, eggs and coffee

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en: Valeriana is a 60-year-old woman from Baybay, Leyte. She runs a business buying and selling rice. She works hard to keep her business since it also involves help and labor from other people. Valeriana also raise hogs for additional income. She is asking for a loan to buy feed, piglets and more rice to sell in the market. In the future, Valeriana hopes to expand her business and save for her needs.

loans.use: to buy feed, piglets and more rice

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is from Baybay, Leyte. She is married and has two children, ages 8 and 14. Rice is a staple food in the country and Jennifer was able to make a business out of this demand eight years ago. She has been a rice dealer since then, earning an average of 8,000 PHP per month for her family. Jennifer is requesting a loan to buy more rice to resell for a profit. This loan will enable her to meet orders and increase her income. She hopes to be successful for her children.

loans.use: to buy more rice

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en: 59-year-old Angelina is a sari-sari store owner from the community of Baybay, Leyte. She is married to a farmer and has two grandchildren who are dependent on her. Angelina has been selling basic items to the community for 11 years now. She is asking for a loan to increase her inventory and to attract more customers. She will use it to buy biscuits, chocolate bars, candies, vinegar, chips, shampoo and bath soap. Angelina is aware of how a store that looks full will attract more buyers than the ones that lack displays. Angelina plans to expand her store and introduce more merchandise that she does not currently carry.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, chocolate bars, candies, vinegar, chips, shampoo and bath soap to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more tobacco

loans.name: Manuela Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal KANCHARISUN, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Manuela tiene 55 años  es separada y tiene 04 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada,  la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo e esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de víveres para su hogar como arroz, azúcar entre otros.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Kancharisun" communal bank, which is located in the district and department of Cuzco. 

Manuela, 55, is separated and has four children. She alternates her daily activities with her work in a private company. She is grateful for this loan and she promises to comply with the established installments. She is a responsible, persevering person, which is how she provides for her family. 

She is applying for a loan to buy supplies for her home, such as rice and sugar, among others.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her home, such as rice and sugar, among others.

loans.name: Jaime Isaias

texts.es: Jaime de 37 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su madre y su grupo familiar desde hace 14 años. Él es un hombre soltero que se esfuerza cada día para apoyar a su madre con los gastos del hogar por lo que junto a ella decidió instalar una venta de tortillas en su vivienda desde hace 6 años lo que le ha permitido sostener la economía de su hogar. Jaime desea invertir en su negocio ya que desea comprar maíz por mayoreo, porque al comprar de esta manera se lo venden más barato y él puede obtener mejores ingresos económicos y ofrecer mayor cantidad de productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en maíz por mayor para ofrecer productos más barato a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jaime is 37 years old and has been living with his Mom and family in their own home for the past 14 years. 

Jaime is single, every day he strives to support his Mom with the household costs. They decided to open a Tortilla store in their home six years ago, which has allowed them to support their household. 

Jaime wishes to invest in his business and wants to buy wholesale corn, as buying corn in this way it is sold a lot cheaper. As a result, Jaime would be able to increase his earnings and offer a greater quantity of products. 

This is why Jaime is requesting a loan from FUSAI, to invest in wholesale corn and offer cheaper products to his customers.

loans.use: to invest in wholesale corn

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is 40 years old. She is married and has two young sons. Her husband is a farmer while Marilyn runs a sari-sari store where she sells items like biscuits, soft drinks, spices and detergent. Marilyn earns about 3,000 PHP per month with her store, and she helps her husband through the income that she earns from this small business. Marilyn has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy more items to sell such as salt, sugar, insect repellent, canned goods, noodles and soft drinks. Marilyn hopes for her family to experience an abundant life.

loans.use: to buy salt, sugar, insect repellent, canned goods, noodles and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
Ofelia es un madre joven de tan solo 20 años de edad, ella tiene una hija de un año a pesar de la escases económica  ella vive muy feliz en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Ofelia por la escasez de recursos económicos de sus padres no pudo finalizar sus estudios, ella se casó muy joven, y lo que busca ahora  es un desarrollo integral para su familia, ella desde hace cuatro años trabaja para una tortillería, esto lo hace con el fin de buscar ingresos económicos para poder construir su futuro al lado de su esposo.  Pues según lo que comenta Ofelia ella quisiera algún día tener su propia tortillería pero para eso hay que trabajar constantemente  para alcanzar ese sueño. 
Uno de las necesidades que se le presenta a Ofelia ahora, es la remodelación de su casa, para ella es muy importante tener un espacio digno donde vivir, Ofelia  anda en busca de un prestamo para empezar con este trabajo,  Ella ha tocado las puertas de ADICLA para solicitar el prestamo, lo que ella necesita son dos mil quetzales, Ofelia está muy segura que conseguirá lo que anhela.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a young mother at only 20 years old. She has a one-year-old daughter. Despite financial hardship, she lives very happily in a community of Suchitepéquez.

Due to her parents' lack of financial resources, Ofelia was not able to finish her studies. She married very young. Her goal now is her family's development. For four years, she has been working in a tortilla shop to earn a financial income to build her future alongside her husband. Ofelia says that she would like to have her own tortilla shop one day, but she needs to work constantly to make that dream come true.

One of Ofelia's current needs is to remodel her house. It is very important to her to have a decent place to live. Looking for a loan to start this work, she came to ADICLA to apply for a loan. She needs two thousand Guatemalan quetzals. Ofelia is very sure that she will get what she is wishing for.

loans.use: to remodel her home.

loans.name: Tarcila

texts.en:
Tarcila is a 63-year-old woman from Baybay, Leyte. She is married with two grown children.

Tarcila cooks snacks to sell in her place to earn a living. She sells rice cakes and pancakes. This has been her business for ten years now. She also raises hogs for additional income.

She is asking for a loan to buy rice, sugar, molders, piglets and feed. She knows that a loan will go a long way in her business. The income will pay for healthy food for herself and her husband.

In the future, she hopes to have enough savings so that they can retire in comfort.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, molders, piglets and feed.

loans.name: Fermin

texts.en:
Fermin is a 46-year-old fish vendor from Baybay, Leyte. He is married with five children, ages three to twenty-four. Aside from selling fish, he also raises hogs for a living.

Fermin works hard to provide for his family and improve their living conditions. He is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell and also repair his piggery.

Fermin hopes to expand and have a successful business in the future, so he can give his children a good life.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell and also repair his piggery.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal KANCHARISUN, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Maria Jesús tiene 30 años y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artículos de regalos, la socia a la vez trabaja en una empresa privada, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo e esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de adornos, peluches entre otros.
texts.en:
The member is a part of the communal bank “Kancharisun.” The bank is located in the Cusco district of the Cusco state.

The member, Maria Jesús, is 30 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with her business, selling gifts. At the same time, she works in a private business. She feels thankful for the loan and she promises to make the established payments. She is a responsible and persevering person, and this is how she helps her family get ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy ornaments and stuffed animals, among other things.

loans.use: to buy ornaments and stuffed animals, among other things.

loans.name: Edith Rocio

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia sigue dedicándose a trabajar en una empresa privada de transporte interprovincial, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL" communal bank which is located in the department of Cusco.

The member continues to work in a private inter-provincial transportation company. She is grateful for the loan given and promises to comply with the established installment payments. She is a responsible and diligent person. In this manner she gets her family ahead. Edith is requesting a loan to have maintenance done on her car.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her vehicle.

loans.name: La Providence Group

texts.fr: Kunywana est commerçante, présidente du groupe de crédits «La Providence», client de l’IMF Hekima, mariée a un Directeur d’école, âgée de 35 ans, mère 9 enfants  qui tous étudient. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse de souliers usagés dames, sacs a main et pagnes au marché de la ville depuis 15 ans. Elle va acheter souliers usagés dames, sacs à main et pagnes. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Kunywana is a saleswoman and the president of the La Providence credit group. The group is a member of IMF Hekima. Kunywana is married to a school director and is 35 years old with nine children, all of whom go to school. She started her business with funds given to her by her husband. She has been a saleswoman for 15 years, and she sells secondhand shoes, handbags, and traditional pagne dresses at the town market. She buys the shoes, handbags and pagnes. She would like to buy a plot of land, send her children to school and feed them properly. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support for business people who do not qualify for traditional bank loans.

loans.use: to buy secondhand shoes, handbags and pagne dresses.

loans.name: Las Positivas Group

texts.es: El grupo “LAS POSITIVAS” se encuentra conformada por socios empeñosos por mejorar su economía familiar. Carmen tiene 59 años de edad es casada con hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de cereales queso y legumbres hace más de 02 años a través de pedido y ofrece. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más quesos cereales y legumbres. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito invertido. Carmen es la primera persona sentada del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
"Las Positivas" group is made up of people committed to improve their household finances.

Carmen is 59 years old, she is married and has independent children. She has made a living selling cereals, cheese and legumes for more than 2 years. She will use the loan to buy more cheese, cereals and legumes.

The group is grateful to Kiva lenders for the loan. Carmen is the first woman sitting on the left.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cereals and legumes.

loans.name: Ozoda

texts.ru:
Озода 49-летняя жительница района Джиликуль. Джиликуль находится на юго-западной части Таджикистана и имеет хорошие погодные условия для ведение сельского хозяйства. Озода проживает здесь давно. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Сыновьям 21 и 7 лет, а дочери 18 лет. Ее муж работает в коммунальном хозяйстве  села. Озода сама занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота в течение 4 лет. Она покупает молодых телят, откармливают их несколько месяцев, и потом вывозит на продажу. Ей в этом помогают ее дети. Еще Озода занимается земледелием на своем участке земли. Она выращивает лук и другие виды овощей. 
Целью данного кредита является развитие животноводческой деятельности. Озода планирует увеличить поголовье скота и тем самым улучшить условия жизни семьи. Она надеется на Вашу помощь. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас.
texts.en:
Ozoda is a 49 years old resident of the Jilikul region. Jilikul is in the south-west part of Tajikistand and has good weather conditions for agriculture. Ozoda has lived there for a long time. She is married and has three children. Her sons are 21 and 7 years old, and her daughter is 18 years old. Her husband works in the village's municipal services. 

Ozoda has worked with breeding cattle for a period of four years. She purchases young calves, fattens them for some months and then sells them. Her children help her with this. Ozoda also works with field crop cultivation on her own plot of land. She grows onions and other types of vegetables. 

The goal of this loan is to develop her cattle breeding business. Ozoda plans to increase the number of cattle and this way improve her living conditions. She hopes for your help. You can help her now.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Precidi Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kizanye est une commerçante, présidente d’un groupe communautaire «Precidi», âgée de 32 ans, et mère de 5 enfants dont 3 étudient et 2 sont gosses. La cliente est vendeuse des boissons. Elle installe ses marchandises dans un dépôt relais de la ville. Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de son mari qui est fonctionnaire de l’Etat. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 3 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir de s’approvisionner en 65 caisses de bière Primus. Ainsi, elle souhaite scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneuses non bancables.
texts.en: Kizanye is a saleswoman and the president of the Precidi community group. She is 32 years old with five children, of whom three go to school and two are too small. This client sells beverages. She sets up her merchandise at a counter in the town. She started her business with the help of her husband, a civil servant. In the future, she will be able to enjoy a loan from IMF Hekima. She has been in this business for three years. This new loan will enable her to buy 65 crates of Primus beer. This will permit her to send her children to school and feed them properly. Finally, she thanks Hekima very warmly for their role in helping businesswomen who do not have access to traditional banking to become autonomous.

loans.use: to buy 65 crates of Primus beer.

loans.name: La Patience Group

texts.fr: Muhindo est commerçante, trésorière du groupe de crédits «La Patience», client de l’IMF Hekima, veuve, âgée de 43 ans, mère 2 enfants qui tous étudient. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de sa famille. Elle est vendeuse de friperies au marché de la ville depuis 10 ans. Elle va acheter 6 ballons de friperies. Elle  souhaite accroitre son crédit, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Muhindo is a storekeeper, a treasurer for the loan group "La Patience," and a client of IMF Hekima. She is a widow, 43 years old and a mother of 2 children, who are both studying. She started her business with funds that she received from her family.She has been selling second-hand clothing at the town market for 10 years. She will buy 6 bags of second-hand clothing. She would like to increase her loan, send her children to school and feed them. Lastly, she thanks Hekima for the support given to non bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 6 bags of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Bakbu

texts.ru: Бакбу, 47 лет, замужем, детей нет. У Бакбу среднее образование. Около 4 лет назад она стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством, накопив на старт сумму в 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бакбу на сегодняшний день у нее есть 5 коров, 50 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет всего около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и реализации. Бакбу планирует расширить ее бизнес и накопить средства на покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en:
Bakbu is 47 years old and married. She does not have children. Bakbu has secondary education. Around four years ago, she started working with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having saved up a start-up sum of 25,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her persistent work, she currently has five cows and fifty sheep. The monthly income is around 15,000 som (KGS) in total. 

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock for fattening and selling. Bakbu plans to expand her business and save up moeny for purchasing furniture for her home.

loans.use: to purchase livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Agripina Matilde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA TERMINAL, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 

La socia Agripina Matilde alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa de transporte el cual brinda servicio interprovincial, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar llantas.
texts.en:
Agripina Matilde is a member of the Communal Bank "Señor de Huanca Terminal", located in the district of Cusco.

Agripina combines her daily activities with her work in a transport company that offers interprovincial service.

She feels grateful for the loan and she is committed to meet her established quotas. Agripina is a responsible and perseverant woman, that is how she manages to provide for her family.

She requests the loan to buy tyres.

loans.use: to buy tyres

loans.name: La Réponse Group

texts.fr: Magendo est commerçante, secrétaire du groupe solidaire «La Réponse», client de l’IMF Hekima, mariée a un étudiant, âgée de 40 ans, mère 9 enfants  dont 8 étudient et 1 est gosse. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse de friperies pour bébés au marché de la ville depuis 15 ans. Elle va acheter 10 ballons de friperies. Elle souhaite accroitre son crédit, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Magendo is a storekeeper, a secretary for the support group "La Réponse," and a client of IMF Hekima. She is married to a student, is 40 years old, a mother of 9 children, 8 of which  are studying and 1 is still very young. She started her business with funds that she received from her husband. She has been selling second-hand clothing for babies at the town market for 15 years. She will buy 10 bags of second-hand clothing. She would like to increase her loan, send her children to school and feed them. Lastly, she thanks Hekima for the support given to non bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 10 bags of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru:
Гулчехра молодая жена и мать троих детей. Ей 31 год. Она проживает в районе Рудаки. Гулчехра сейчас с детьми живет у родителей, так как ее муж находится за границей, по причине того, что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. Гулчехра дома  воспитывает  детей и одновременно ведет свое швейное дело.  Ее маленькой дочке уже 4 года, а сыновьям по 8 и 7 лет, которые учатся в средней школе. 
После рождения третьего ребенка Гулчехра научилась шить и кроить женскую одежду. Она быстро освоила все навыки, чтобы скорее начать зарабатывать и улучшить финансовое состояние семьи. Вот уже два года как она у себя дома занимается данным видом бизнеса. Гулчехра берет кредит для купли тканей и материалов для шитья платьев. Этот кредит поможет ей не потерять источник дохода и расширить деятельность.
texts.en:
Gulchehra is a young wife and the mother of three children. She is 31 years old. She lives in the Rudaki region. Currently Gulchehra and her children live with her parents, as her husband is abroad becuase he was not able to find work within the country. 

Gulchehra both raises her children and manages a sewing business from her home. Her youngest daughter is four years old, and the sons are 8 and 7, so they go to school. After giving birth to her third child, Gulchehra learned how to sew and cut women's clothing. She soon mastered all the skills needed to start earning money and improve the family's financial situation. She has worked with this business from her home for two years already.

Gulchehra takes a loan to purchase fabric and materials for sewing dresses. This loan will help her to not lose her source of income and to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabric to continue her sewing business

loans.name: Saviya

texts.ru: Савия, 25 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Савии- среднее образование. В поисках дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2005 году, благодаря упорному труду Савии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется корова, 5 овец и лошадь, а на земельной доле мерою 0,5 Га арендованной и 2,0 Га собственной земли Савия выращивает картофель, ячмень и эспарцет для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Савия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян картофеля элитных сортов. Экологически чистые овощи пользуются большим спросом, у Савии наработаны постоянные оптовые покупатели. Доходы от кредита Савия планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества породистых дойных коров, и накопить на строительство жилого дома.
texts.en:
Saviya is 25 years old, married and the mother of two children. Saviya has secondary education. In search of additional income for her family, she has worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation since 2005. Thanks to Saviya's persistent work, her farm currently has one cow, five sheep and one horse. She also grows potatoes, barley and hay for own use and sale on 0.5 hectares of rented land and 2.0 hectares of her own land.

With an aim to further develop her business, Saviya turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) to purchase seeds of potato of high quality. There is a large demand for organic vegetables. Saviya has returning wholesale buyers. Saviya plans to invest the income from the loan in increasing the number of purebred dairy cows, and to save money for building a house.

loans.use: to purchase seeds of potato in order to grow organic vegetables for selling

loans.name: Azizmoh

texts.ru:
39-летняя Азизмох проживает в районе Рудаки. У нее прекрасная семья: любимый муж и двое замечательных детей в возрасте 14 и 3 лет. Они живут очень скромно. Ее муж работает мастером по ремонту домов. Сама Азизмох обладает мастерством кройки и шитья. Уже на протяжении полтора года она занимается пошивом женских платьев национального стиля. Азизмох любит свою деятельность и хорошо справляется с ней. По ее словам ей удобно шить на дому, так как она дополнительно может делать работу по домашнему хозяйству и присматривать за детьми. 
В данный момент Азизмох начинает долгожданный ремонт в доме, чтобы улучшить условия проживания семьи.  Она видит, что ей не хватает еще немного средств для покупки стройматериалов и поэтому обратилась за кредитом. Ваша поддержка им сейчас очень важна.
texts.en:
39 year old Azizmoh lives in the Rudaki region. She has a great family: A loving husband and two wonderful children of the age of 14 and 3. They live very modestly. Azizmoh's husband works as a master carpenter, renovating houses. 

Azizmoh is a master of cutting and sewing. She has worked with sewing women's national dresses for a period of 1.5 years. Azizmoh loves her work and copes well with it. She thinks it is convenient to sew from her home, as she in addition can do household work and look after the children. 

Currently, Azizmoh will start a long-awaited renovation of her home, in order to improve the family's living conditions. She can see that she does not have enough money to purchase the building materials, and therefore she applied for a loan. Your help is very important to her.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for renovating her home

loans.name: Manuel Enrique

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.
El  socio Manuel Enrique continua   trabajando para  una institución privada, el  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas, él socio continua trabajando para dicha empresa el cual le va bien y le trae satisfacciones personales, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma  salir adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una laptop.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "COMUZONE" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, which is in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member, Manuel Enrique, still works for a private institution. He is grateful for the support that was granted, and he promises to make his payments in a disciplined manner. 

Manuel Enrique's continued work for the aforementioned company is going well for him and brings him personal satisfaction. He would like to be able to continue working in order to get ahead.

Manuel Enrique is requesting the loan for the purchase of a laptop.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay thesis expenses.

loans.name: Blanca Inés

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y salir adelante junto con sus hijos. 
Hace aproximadamente 4 años inició desesperadamente la búsqueda de una fuente de ingresos para su hogar. Fue así como inició la cría y venta de pollos, negocio que le ha venido generando ganancias con las cuales puede sostener los gastos de su hogar. 
Blanca busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de cuido para los pollos, adecuar el corral de sus pollos. Sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.
Blanca tiene la esperanza en que el préstamo le permita salir adelante con su negocio. 
Además, espera que su negocio crezca y genere mayores ingresos con los cuales les pueda ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. 
Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Blanca ¡
texts.en:
Blanca is a person who has had to go through many adversities in her life. However, she has always had the strength to overcome them and get ahead with her children.

Approximately 4 years ago, she began desperately searching for a source of income for her household. It was in this way that she began raising and selling chickens, a business that has been generating earnings with which she can sustain the household expenses.

Bianca looks for a loan that will offer her the possibility to purchase chicken feed, and fix up the chicken pen. She knows that with the help of Corporación Interactuar she can achieve it. 

Bianca has the hope that the loan will allow her to get ahead with her business.

In addition, she hopes that her business grows and generates more income with which she can offer her children a better quality of life and more opportunities for progress.

With the loan that you make today, you can improve Bianca's life and business!

loans.use: to purchase chicken feed, fix up the pen, since they are dying due to the strong climatic changes.

loans.name: 1 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
El comité “1 de mayo” pasa al 9no ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas son mujeres que luchan por sus familias y seres queridos, y con ello quieren ir creciendo. Ellas son de una zona rural aun en crecimiento.
Sonia, una de las integrantes de este grupo cuenta que se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, ella misma se encarga de la cría de los mismos y luego los vende o faena. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que ayuda a su familia por medio de este humilde trabajo.
Sonia pide este préstamo para poder comprar balanceados para sus animales, de manera a poder seguir con la cría de los mismos. Agradece por la oportunidad que todas están recibiendo, de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias.
texts.en:
The communal bank “1 de mayo” [1st of May] is in its ninth women’s communal bank program cycle. They are women who fight for their families and loved ones, and with that they want to grow. They are from a rural area that is still growing. 

Sonia, one of the members of this group, works raising and selling animals. She herself is in charge of raising the animals and later sells or slaughters them. She is a very hardworking and determined person who helps her family through this humble work. 

Sonia asks for this loan in order to buy feed for her animals so that she can continue raising them. She appreciates the opportunity they are all receiving to be able to improve living conditions for themselves and their families.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
Pascual tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y su menor hijo en una zona rural de la provincia de Callayuc, ubicada en la región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. La población de esta comunidad se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería

El se dedica a la destilación y comercio de aguardiente, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 18 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de materia prima (caña de azúcar) de la cual destilará el aguardiente, de esta manera tendrá una mayor producción de aguardiente y por ende tendrá mayores ventas y mayores ingresos, los cuáles le permitirán tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Pascual is 39 years old. He lives with his wife and his son, who is a minor, in a rural area of the province of Callayuc, which is located in the Cajamarca region of Peru's northern mountains. The population of this community works in farming, commerce, and livestock production. He earns his living in the distillation and sale of "aguardiente" [a distilled spirit]. He has 18 years of experience in this field and very good personal and work references in his area. 

He will use the loan that is being granted for the purchase of a larger quantity of raw material (sugar cane) from which he will distill the aguardiente. This way, he will have a greater production of aguardiente, and as a result, he will have greater sales and a larger income, which will allow him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of raw materials (sugar cane), from which he will distill liquor

loans.name: Gabriela Maria

texts.es:
Gabriela es madre soltera de un hijo e 8 años de edad; desde hace aproximadamente 1 año se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como ropa, perfumería, cremas corporales, accesorios, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como blusas, jeans, zapatos, accesorios, perfumería, entre otros, así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.
Gabriela, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial grande donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a su hijo una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gabriela is the single mother of an 8-year-old child. For approximately the past 1 year, she has worked as an independent businesswoman, work she learned empirically and that arose from the necessity to earn resources to sustain her family. She offers all sorts of products such as clothing, perfumes, body creams, and accessories, among others, and has the advantage of meeting new people daily to whom she can offer her merchandise, improving her sales each day. 

Currently, she is asking for the help of a loan to purchase merchandise in bulk such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, and perfumes, among others, to be able to stock up with more variety to satisfy the demand that increases in this season, improving her level of income.

Gabriela, with determination and dedication, wants to continue working to get her business ahead, since in the near future she dreams of having the possibility to open a shop in a large commercial location where she can offer a greater variety of articles and that will generate a profitability and a good economic stability to give her child an excellent education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of perfumes, clothing, body creams, and accessories to give a boost each day to her business.

loans.name: Gricelda

texts.es:
Gricelda  es una persona muy dedicada y trabajadora hace 5 años que está trabajando y estudiando a la vez. Provengo de una Familia Humilde pero muy trabajadora.
Su meta futura es recibirse, trabajar en su profesión y seguir formándose cada día más.
Pide este préstamo para cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma poder seguir con cubrir sus gastos.
texts.en: Gricelda is a very dedicated and hardworking person. For five years she has been working and studying at the same time. She comes from a humble, but very hardworking family. Her future goal is to graduate, work in her profession, and continue educating herself more each day. She asks for this loan to cover her degree expenses, and in this way be able to continue with covering her expenses.

loans.use: to pay her degree expenses.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un humilde trabajador residente en el municipio de Medellin con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 

Es padre de 2 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la venta de alimentos como frutas y algunas verduras, estos alimentos los transporta en una carretilla y los vende de manera ambulante.
Le dedica 11 horas diarias a su negocio.
De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de frutas como bananas y sandias al por mayor para tener una muy buen producción en esta temporada, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a humble hard worker, who lives in the municipality of Medellín with a life full of dreams, hopes and the best desires for his family. 

He is the father of 2 children, for whom he has always had the value and responsibility to act so that their life is the best. 

These days, he earns his living selling foods such as fruits and some vegetables. He transports these foods in a cart and sells them as a street vendor. 

He works 11 hours a day to his business.

Of the principal difficulties that he has to confront in his work are the strong rains and the high costs of the raw materials. 

He asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of fruits such as bananas and watermelons in bulk to have a very good production this season and, in turn, be able to have sufficient income to continue with his business and sustain his family.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of fruits and vegetables to stock and boost his business.

loans.name: Jorge William

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 47 años de edad, que desde hace 5 años comenzó a trabajar en diferentes actividades, actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes que un familiar le cedió para que la trabajara y generara ingresos para sustentar los gastos del hogar.
Este negocio lo atiende todos los días de 7 am a 8 pm y, a pesar de la competencia que existe en el sector, ha obtenido buenos resultados, generando ingresos suficientes para que a su esposa y a sus 4 hijos no les haga falta nada.
El crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor como mecato, lácteos, galletería, granos, entre otros, esto le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos para satisfacer las necesidades inmediatas de sus clientes, aumentando las ventas e ingresos que recibe por su labor.
Jorge, con su espíritu de superación y las ganas de salir adelante con su familia, lo impulsan a seguir luchando y avanzar para cumplir el sueño de adquirir una casa propia, en la que pueda disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia y brindar una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 47-year-old man who, 5 years ago, began to work in different jobs. Currently, he has a grocery store that a family member transferred to him so that he can run it and generate income to sustain his household expenses. 

He runs this business every day from 7 am to 8 pm and, despite the competition that there is in the sector, he has had good results, generating sufficient income so that his wife and their 4 children don't lack anything.

The loan that he asks Corporación Interactuar for is a support to purchase an assortment in bulk of pastries, dairy products, cookies, and grains, among others. This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products to satisfy his customers' immediate needs, increasing his sales and the income that he gets for his work. 

Jorge's spirit of self-improvement and the desire to get ahead with his family push him to continue fighting and advancing to achieve his dream of getting his own house, in which he can enjoy a better quality of life in the company of his family and offer his children a better education.

loans.use: to stock his business with a variety of products such as pastries, dairy products, cookies, and grains to improve his customers' satisfaction.

loans.name: Yadit Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yadit es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Sahagun desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Yadit y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.
Yadit desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos utensilios de cocina y compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Yadit is a humble and hardworking woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to caring for her children. She lives in the town of Sahagun, which is where she has done a spectacular job of developing a business from her kitchen. Yadit prepares dishes such as tamales, chorizo sausage, empanadas, arepas, and other foods.

These dishes are sold primarily to neighbors in the area who are familiar with the flavors that Yadit produces. They always know that the food they purchase will be delicious and well-prepared.

Yadit wants to increase her food sales and also work in a more comfortable manner. For this reason she is requesting a loan in order to buy a few cooking utensils and supplies that will allow her to continue preparing her recipes such as chicken, flour, cheese, and other items. This loan issued by Interactuar will allow her to move forward with her business and earn the necessary income that will give her the opportunity to continue sustaining her family.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and supplies for preparing traditional dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay enrollment in university.

loans.name: Litiz Dunia

texts.es:
La socia Dunia pertenece al banco comunal SAN ANTONIO, la socia sigue con su negocio de  taller mecánico, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia Dunia requiere el préstamo para comprar faros, aceité entre otros.
texts.en:
Dunia is a member of the San Antonio Communal Bank. She continues to manage her auto repair business. Dunia is grateful for the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. She is a responsible and industrious person. By working in this manner, she is able to help her family move forward.

Dunia is requesting a loan in order to buy headlights, oil, and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy headlights, oil, and other supplies.

loans.name: Nidia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Nidia, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Medellin, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante ubicado en su casa.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 8 horas.
Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.
Nidia ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar ingredientes e insumos para sus recetas.
Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hard-working, Nidia is a warrior woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to the care of her children. She lives in the municipality of Medellín, where she earns a living making a variety of foods such as breakfasts and lunches in a small restaurant located in her house.

She works alone every day for 8 hours. 

Her dishes are known by the neighbors in the sector, who visit her restaurant because they know that they will be able to eat delicious food.

Nidia has decided to improve her business and expand her sales, and for this reason she asks for a loan to purchase ingredients and supplies for her dishes. This loan will allow her to get her business ahead to, in turn, get the income necessary which will give her the opportunity to continue sustaining her family and her business. 

Support this woman with a dream and make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and supplies for her dishes. She looks to boost her business to continue sustaining her family.

loans.name: Boris Alexander

texts.es:
Boris es un hombre muy entregado a su trabajo pues a sus 40 años de edad trabaja incasablemente todos los días de la semana de lunes a domingo en su negocio de producción de arepas. 
Padre de 4 hijos que depende totalmente de él ve una oportunidad de una entidad que le brinda la confianza de tener un crédito para mejorar su negocio y soñar con su fábrica de producción de alimentos y hacerle creer que es posible alcanzar este sueño. 
Le dedica 10 horas diarias a su negocio.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de maíz para la elaboración de sus arepas para aumentar su producción.
Con la ayuda de este crédito el señor Boris producirá mas alimentos y le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos para cada día darle mejores oportunidades de vida a sus 4 hijos
texts.en:
Boris is a man very dedicated to his work since, at 40 years old, he works tirelessly every day of the week from Monday to Sunday in his business making arepas.

The father of 4 children who depend on him completely, he sees an opportunity in an entity that offers him the confidence of having a loan to improve his business and dream of his food production factory and make him believe that it is possible to achieve this dream.  

He works 10 hours a day at his business.

He asks for a loan to purchase corn to make his arepas to increase his production.

With the help of this loan, Boris will make more food and it will allow him to get more income to give his children better opportunities in life each day.

loans.use: to purchase corn to make arepas [corn cakes], a very typical and much consumed product in Antioquía.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El comité Virgen de Fátima se encuentra en el cuarto ciclo. El grupo se formo con 18 integrantes todas con actividades independientes, que se dedican a actividades eminentemente rurales, cada una lucha por poder crecer y mejorar.
La señora Rosa una de las integrantes se dedica a la cría de animales, los cuales cría, luego vende o faena, es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora. Su meta es poder seguir trabajando y luchando por crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Virgen de Fátima is in its fourth cycle. The group was formed by 18 members, all with independent businesses, who work in eminently rural activities. Each one fights to be able to grow and improve. 

La señora Rosa, one of the members, works raising animals, which she raises and later sells or slaughters. She is a very selfless and determined woman. Her goal is to be able to continue working and fighting to grow. 

She asks for this loan in order to invest it in buying feed for her animals, and in that way be able to continue fighting as she is doing.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Jose Mercedes

texts.es:
Jose Mercedes tiene 66 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en la parte rural del distrito de Cañaris, ubicado en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en este distrito es muy tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

La actividad que realiza es la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos, gallinas, patos, cuyes, entre otros, adicionalmente se dedica a la venta de comida. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El presente crédito será para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como patos, pavos, cerdos, cuyes, entre otros, así como para realizar reparaciones del lugar donde los cría (corrales). Con esto Jose Mercedes espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores niveles de ventas y por ende incrementará sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Mercedes is 66 years old and lives in his own house with his spouse and their two children in the rural part of Cañaris district, located in Ferreñafe province, Lambayeque region, in the northern mountains of Peru.  Life in this district is very peaceful, the population primarily works in agriculture, animal husbandry, and trade. 

The work that he does is raising and selling small animals such as pigs, hens, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others. In addition, he works selling food. The current loan will be used to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of animals such as ducks, turkeys, pigs, and guinea pigs, among others, and also to make repairs to the place where raises them (corrals). With this, Jose Mercedes hopes to offer a greater variety of animals to his customers, which will increase his level of sales and, in the end, will increase his income, which will permit him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals such as ducks, turkeys, guinea pigs, and others, and also to repair the place where he raises them (corrals).

loans.name: Willer

texts.es:
Willer tiene 33 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su padre en el distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como chivos, carneros, cerdos, entre otros, desde hace más de 05 años. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como cuyes, cerdos, patos, entre otros, así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos. Con esto Willer espera mejorar la productividad de su negocio ofreciendo una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Willer is 33 years old, and lives in his own house with his father in the district of Cayaltí, which is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. He lives in a community which works in trade, agriculture and animal husbandry as its principal economic activities. 

He has worked raising and selling small animals such as goats, rams, and pigs, among others, for the past 5 years. He has experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the zone. This loan will be destined to purchase a greater quantity of animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, and ducks, among others, and also balanced feed to fatten them. With this, Willer hopes to improve his business's productivity, offering a greater variety of animals to his customers which will generate more income for him, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, and ducks, among others, and also balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Luzlinda

texts.es:
Luzlinda tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los habitantes de esta zona se dedican a la pesca artesanal, agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, conejos, cuyes, pollos y otros, desde hace más de 01 año de manera continua. Es conocida en su distrito por la labor que realiza y cuenta con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El presente crédito lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como patos, cuyes, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos. Con esto Luzlinda espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luzlinda is 26 years old, partnered, and lives in her own house with her partner and children in the district of Lagunas, located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this zone work in traditional fishing, agriculture, and animal husbandry as their principal economic activities. 

She has worked raising and selling small animals such as ducks, rabbits, guinea pigs, chickens, and more, for the past 1 year continuously. She is known in her district for the work she does and has regular customers who offer very good personal and work references for her. The current loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of animals such as ducks, guinea pigs, chickens, among others, and also to purchase balanced feed to fatten them.

With this, Luzlinda hopes to offer a greater variety of animals to her customers which will have a positive impact on her income level and in the end will permit her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals such as ducks, guinea pigs, chickens, and more, and also to purchase balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Amado

texts.es:
Amado tiene 48 años de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, de la región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú. La población de esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte en su unidad vehicular (combi), cuenta con más de 1 año de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su unidad vehicular (combi) ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Amado espera brindar un mejor servicio de transporte para poder satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes de la zona y darles una mayor seguridad, esto se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Amado is 48 years old, married, and has 8 children. He lives with his family in a rural zone of Oyotún district, located in Chiclayo province, Labayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The population in this zone works in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry. 

He works offering transportation services in his vehicle (a van). He has more than 1 year of experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan will be to make repairs and maintain his vehicle (van) since it currently is in bad shape. With this, Amado hopes to offer better transportation service to be able to satisfy the needs of his customers in the zone and provide them better safety. This will also be reflected in his level of income which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and do maintenance to his vehicle (van) since currently it is in bad condition.

loans.name: Brenda Leticia

texts.es:
Brenda es una señora que se esmera en apoyar a su esposo para generar un poco de ingresos y darles lo mejor a sus hijos, ella tiene dos hijos uno de 11 años y el otro de un año. Ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá. 
Brenda es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para prosperar en la vida, ella desde hace cinco años instalo una tienda de consumo diario y  golosinas, lo tiene en su casa esto es ventajoso para ella ya que no descuida su familia. Para Brenda esta tienda ha sido uno de los negocios que si le genera ingresos, porque afortunadamente ella vive cerca de un instituto y a la hora de receso se llena de niños y ella tiene que comprar productos por lo menos dos veces a la semana para mantener la tienda , pues con el capital que tiene no es suficiente para hacer esta inversión, pues para complementar y comprar todo lo necesario ella está ahora buscando un prestamo para inversión de la tienda  además de las golosinas algunos alumnos  le piden  que venda algo mas nutritivo ahora ella implemento la venta de refacciones. 
Ademas de esa tienda Brenda también elabora tejidos típicos, esto lo hace por las tardes, ya que la encargad de atender la tienda por las tardes es su hija de once años, el anhelo de Brenda  es que su tienda este siempre con muchos productos. Y con las ganancias sueña construir una casa más y apoyar a sus hijos a seguir estudiando hasta ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Brenda is a woman who strives to help her husband by generating a little bit of income in order to provide the best for their children. She has two children, ages 11 and 1. They live in the community of Sololá.

Brenda is a woman who enjoys working so that she can prosper in life. Five years ago, she opened a store where she sells everyday consumer products and snacks. Having the store in her house is advantageous because she is able to look after her family. This store is one of Brenda’s businesses that generate income. Fortunately, she lives near a school and her business is full of children during recess. This means that she has to buy products at least twice a week in order to maintain her store. Since her capital is not sufficient to make this investment, she is now seeking a loan as supplemental funds for buying everything that she needs. In addition to the products that she offers, some students are requesting that she sell more nutritious items, so she now plans to sell homemade snacks.

In addition to her store, Brenda produces traditional woven articles. She works at this business in the afternoons, so her 11-year-old daughter looks after the store during that time. Brenda’s wish is that her store will always be stocked with many products. With her earnings, she dreams of building another house and helping her children continue their studies until they become professionals.

loans.use: to buy everyday consumer products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a security wall around her home, which will provide safety for her children.

loans.name: Early Fredy

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.
El  socio Early sigue  trabajando para  una institución del estado, el  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una laptop.
texts.en:
Early is a member of the Communal Bank “Comuzone II” which is located in the District of Huanchac in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco. He continues to work at a state institution. Early appreciates the support that has been given to him, so he promises to complete his loan payments in a disciplined manner. He wants to keep working so that he can continue to support his family.

Early is requesting a loan in order to buy a laptop computer.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Amparo De Jesus

texts.es:
La señora Amparo es una agricultora muy habilidosa con experiencia en varias áreas de la agricultura, con un talento innato para el trabajo en equipo y una gran mente emprendedora.
Tiene un cultivo de café que atiende todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, además tiene una cría de ganado.
Actualmente vive con su esposo y con tres de sus 7 hijos por los cuales ha tratado de luchar siempre para sacarlos adelante.
Ella desea darle un impulso a sus actividades y obtener mejores ingresos de este por eso pide un auxilio económico para invertirlo en insumos agropecuarios como pesticidas, abonos y semillas de café, y compra de ganado el préstamo le dará la oportunidad de tener una producción de mejor calidad.
Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y brindarle a sus hijos un buen futuro!
texts.en:
Señora Amparo is an outstanding farmer who has a great deal of experience in different aspects of agriculture as well as an innate talent for working as part of a team and a keen businesswoman's mind. She tends to her coffee crop every day, starting early in the morning, and also has a herd of livestock. 

Señora Amparo lives with her husband seven of their three children. As a mother, she's always striven with great tenacity to provide a better life for her family. 

Señora Amparo wants to improve her coffee production and her herd, and thus earn more income. She is therefore applying for a loan so that she can purchase supplies such as insecticides, manure, and coffee seeds, as well as livestock. This loan will provide her the opportunity to improve the quality of her coffee and the animals she raises. 

Señora Amparo's most important goal is to have her own home and provide her children a bright future!

loans.use: because this talented woman would like to purchase insecticides, manure, and coffee seeds. These supplies, however, are costly and Señora Amparo lacks the funds to invest in them.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 35 años de edad, soltero, tiene 1 hijo varón de 12 años y su negocio es la venta de comida rápida.
El es emprendedor, independiente, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona de ‘villa Fátima’ un área caracterizada por el comercio mayorista; camiones cargados de frutas, verduras y carne llegan desde el norte para ser comercializados en el lugar y por mayor. De clima frío y seco con fuertes vientos que llegan de la cordillera.
Miguel es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos obscuros, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su hijo que estudia en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de comida rápida como; hamburguesas, salchipapas (salchicha y papas fritas), sándwiches, y otros, en un puesto de venta fijo. Anteriormente trabajó durante varios años en una empresa de eventos manejando el sonido, donde obtuvo los conocimientos sobre ese rubro, actualmente decidió independizarse y trabajar por su cuenta, mientras tanto logre sus metas temporalmente se dedica a la venta de comida . “quiero tener mi empresa de sonido, me faltan algunos equipos mientras los consiga trabajo vendiendo comida para pagar los gastos del hogar…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un restaurante grande y amplio. El desea desarrollar su negocio de sonido realizando la compra de equipos de sonido, como amplificadores y otros. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Miguel solicita un préstamo para desarrollar su negocio de sonido comprando equipos de sonido.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 35-year-old man who is single and has a 12-year-old son. His business involves selling fast food.

Miguel is enterprising, independent, responsible, and hardworking. He conducts his business in the Villa Fátima District, an area known for wholesale trade. Trucks carrying fruits, vegetables, and meat from the north arrive in this place so that these products can be sold in bulk. The weather is cold and dry. Strong winds blow from the mountains.

Miguel has a dark complexion, short black hair, and dark eyes. His native language is Aymara, but he speaks Spanish so that he can integrate into the general culture and conduct business. He shares his life with his son who is studying in school. They live in a rented brick house that has running water, electricity, and sewage services. His business involves selling fast food such as hamburgers, “salchipapas” (sausages and fried potatoes), sandwiches, and other dishes from an established location. For several years, he previously worked for an events company where he was in charge of the sound system. He was able to gain knowledge about this line of work, but now he has decided to become independent and work on his own. While he is attempting to achieve this goal, Miguel sells food on a temporary basis. “I want to have my own sound business, but I lack a few pieces of equipment. In the meantime, I continue selling food so that I can pay the household expenses,” says Miguel. His dream is to also have a large spacious restaurant.

Miguel wants to develop his sound business by purchasing sound equipment, such as amplifiers and other components. This is his second loan cycle with Emprender and he has been in this line of work for 15 years. For the reasons previously mentioned, Miguel is requesting a loan so that he can develop his sound business through the purchase of equipment.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Kuña Guapa 2 está  integrado  por  24 mujeres, están en el 2do. Ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde  trabajan y se ayudan para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Florentina, quien se dedica a la venta de productos varios, como ser jabones, suavizantes, aceites, carnes, combustibles y demás. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha por poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener y es por ello que pone su mejor esfuerzo para crecer.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de  jabones, suavizantes, aceites, carnes, combustibles y demás, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group named “Kuña Guapa 2” includes 24 women. They are in their second loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. As a group, they are working and helping one another with improving their living conditions. They are also participating in the poverty elimination program.

One of the members is Sra. Florentina. She sells various products such as soaps, fabric softeners, oil, meats, fuel, and other goods. Florentina is a hardworking individual who strives to provide her family with everything that she was not able to have. For this reason, she is doing her best to grow.

Florentina is requesting a loan in order to buy soaps, fabric softeners, oil, meats, fuel, and other products. This will help her to continue her sales just as before.

loans.use: to buy soaps, fabric softeners, oil, meats, fuel, and other products.

loans.name: Rosa Oliva

texts.es:
Rosa a sus 58 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad económica se motiva a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de tienda de abarrotes que estará ubicado en una esquina muy transitada del barrio donde reside en municipio de Amaga.
Ella desea ofrecer en su negocio todos los elementos de la canasta familiar.

Rosa es una señora trabajadora, pujante, emprendedora, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos como vitrinas y estanterías e insumos para surtir su negocio como granos, abarrotes, golosinas, entre otros para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.

Gracias al apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar y a los prestamistas de Kiva podrá montar este negocio y conseguirá ser independiente.
texts.en:
Rosa is 58 years old, and has decided to go into business for herself in order to meet her financial needs. She's also found few job opportunities, so a business would allow her to earn income herself. 

Rosa wants to start a grocery store that will be located at a very busy intersection in her neighborhood in the town of Amaga. She wants to offer all of the grocery items that customers would need at the store. 

Rosa is a very industrious, energetic, and entrepreneurial woman. She is applying for a loan so that she can make investments in the fixtures and inventory that the store will need, such as display cases, shelves, and items such as grains, groceries, snacks, and other food items. She hopes to offer a variety of goods that will meet her customers' tastes, and that the store will improve her quality of life and her welfare. 

Thanks to the Corporación Interactuar and to Kiva lenders, Rosa will be able to start her business and achieve her financial independence.

loans.use: to open a grocery store by purchasing display cases, shelves, and stock the store with inventory, ensuring a successful startup for the business.

loans.name: Pedro Juan

texts.es:
Pedro, un hombre de 49 años, vive en el municipio de Sahagun, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Este hombre de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de venta de bebidas y comestibles en el parque principal del municipio, tiene alquilado un pequeño local donde montara su empresa.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Pedro podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que pagara los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de un tv plasma, aire acondicionado, sillas y mesas; todo para su negocio.

Colabora a un hombre emprendedor, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Pedro, 49 years old, lives in the municipality of Sahagun, a small city where is difficult to get ahead, and there is a lot of business competition.

He has an entrepreneurial mind and a large desire to get ahead.  He wants to start a business selling food and beverages in the town's main park.  He has rented a small place to set up his business.  With help from a loan, Pedro will be able to achieve his dream of being independent and earning his own income, that he will use to pay for his household expenses.  The money will be used to buy a plasma TV, air conditioning, chairs and tables, all for his business.  

Help out an entrepreneur, one with a creative mind and big dreams!

loans.use: to achieve his dream of having his own business selling food and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to support her family by starting a business by buying pigs and building a corral.

loans.name: El Bibosi _74 Group

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 36 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 12 7 8 años, y su negocio es la fabricación de cajas para regalos.
Ella es independiente, emprendedora, contante, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona la ‘mutualista’ un área comercial ubicada en el centro de la ciudad caracterizada por agrupar a la mayor parte de oficinas comerciales y de empresas. De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo a una temperatura que varía durante el día entre aproximadamente 21-35 grados centígrados.
Maria es de tez morena, cabello negro largo amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, ojos obscuros, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia para el comercio habla español (la primera de la derecha , usa pantalón negro blusa de colores). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la construcción y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada, construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Sus deseos de superación la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; tienda de barrio, carnicería,  venta de sándwiches, 
artesanía en yeso, venta de refrescos, librería y venta de ropa, para solicita un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la fabricación de cajas para regalo; ella se ocupa de comprar cartón, pinturas, adornos, cartulinas y otros, para elaborar cajas de todo tamaño y las adorna con colores y diseños variados para comercializarlos en tiendas de regalos, comercios y también vacías. “empezé esta actividad por pedido de una amiga que necesitaba cajas para su negocio, con la ayuda de emprender fui ampliando mi negocio y conociendo mayor cantidad de clientes…” comenta. Su sueño es abastecer a todas las tiendas del lugar y tener su marca propia. Ella desea realizar la compra de material de trabajo, como, cartón, pegamento, lentejuelas, cartulina y otros para contar con material de trabajo constante y vender por mayor. Esta es la 8 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de material para la fabricación de cajas para regalo.
texts.en:
Maria is a 36 year old woman, she lives with her partner, and she has 2 children, one of 12 and one of 8 years old.  She has her own business making gift boxes.  She is independent, has an entrepreneurial spirit, is happy, responsible and hard-working.  Her business is located in the area of Mutualista, a commercial area located in the center of the city.  This area is known for being a hub for commercial offices and businesses.  The climate is warm, tropical and humid with a temperature that varies throughout the year between 21-32 degrees Celsius.  

Maria is of dark complexion, she has long, tied up, black hair, she is short and thin, she has dark eyes, her mother tongue is Guaraní, which is what they speak in family, and she also speaks Spanish for business (she is the first person on the right, she is wearing black pants and a colored shirt). 

She lives with her partner, who works in construction, and her children, who both study in elementary school.  They live in a rented house built of brick which has drinking water, electricity and sewage.  

Her dreams of exceling have brought her to lead a group of people who have businesses such as: neighborhood shop, butcher shop, sandwich sales, producing crafts made of plaster, selling drinks, bookstore and clothing sales, so that together they could acquire a loan to improve their businesses.  

Her business is the production of gift boxes.  She is responsible for buying the cardboard, the paint, the decorations, the construction paper and other things so that she can make her gift boxes which come in all types of different sizes and decorated with different colors and designs.  She then also takes care of selling them in gift shops, other types of shops and markets.  

"I started this business as a friend asked me to make her some gift boxes for her business.  With the help of Emprender I started growing my business and getting to know my client more in depth..." she mentions.   Her dream is to supply all the shops in the area and have her own brand.  She wants to buy all the material she needs to work like: cardboard, glue, sequins, construction paper and other things so that she always has materials, so that she can sell in bulk. 

This is the 8th sequence of loans with this institution in 6 years which does this same commercial activity.  It is for this reason that Maria is requesting this loan, to buy materials to make her gift boxes.

loans.use: to buy materials to make gift boxes

loans.name: Olga Marisol

texts.es:
Olga, de 42 años de edad, está acompañada, cursó sus estudios hasta 9° grado, es estilista, vive con sus 3 hijos, el primero tiene 10 años, el segundo 7 años y el tercero tiene 4 años, dos de ellos estudian.  

Olga, tiene experiencia en el área de peluquería, ella tiene una peluquería en su hogar, este trabajo lo aprendió en un curso que tomó de cosmetología. 

Olga, solicita el préstamo para comprar una pieza que necesita ser reparada de un vehículo de su propiedad.

El sueño de Doña Olga es mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, y darles mejores estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Olga, who is 42 years old, is married. She completed her education through 9th grade. She is a stylist. She lives with her three children. The oldest is 10 years old, the second is 7, and the third is 4. Two of them are in school.

Olga has experience in the field of hairdressing. She has a hair salon in her home. She learned this work in a course that she took in cosmetology.

Olga is applying for a loan to purchase a part that needs to be repaired in a vehicle that she owns.

Doña Olga's dream is to improve her quality of life and that of her family, and to give good educations to her children.

loans.use: to buy a part that needs to be repaired for a vehicle that she owns.

loans.name: Mari Elena

texts.es:
Mari es soltera. Aparte de su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años. 
Aprendió de este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. 

Ella y su familia viven en zona rural de Santa Elena en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que ofrece la Corporación Interactuar. 
Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos de plátano.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Mari sueña terminar con la legalización de los papeles de su tierra y así tener en pleno el control de sus tierras.
 
¡Impacte la vida de Mari y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Mari is single. Independent from her family, she has made a living in agriculture for the past 10 years. She learned this business empirically -- that is, through practice and observing other people. She and her family live in a rural area of Santa Elena, where it is not easy to have access to financial services such as those offered by Interactuar. 

She will use this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, products for plague control, and fertilizers in order to maintain and sustain her plantain crops.
