Thanks to this loan, the finances and quality of life of her family will improve because she will be able to increase her income. Mari dreams of finishing the legalization of the papers of her land so that she can take full control of it. 

Change Mari's life and that of her family with a loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, products for plague control, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Rafael Enrique

texts.es:
Rafael, de 59 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidido a salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

El desea desempeñarse como vendedor de carne en el municipio de Sahagún

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y el de su familia, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es un hombre emprendedor y muy disciplinado.

El solicita un crédito para comprar unos cerdos en pie y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresario y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Rafael if 59 years old.  He knows that what he wants in life and he wants to get ahead and have a good life.  He wants to sell meat in the town of Sahagún.

He wants to start this business in order to be able to support his family, and to be able to contribute to the household expenses.  He is entrepreneurial and very disciplined. He is requesting a loan to buy pigs and take advantage of the opportunity through Interactuar to become an entrepreneur.  He hopes to make progress as a businessman and to have more stable earnings.  He thanks everyone who can contribute to his dream.

loans.use: to start a meat distribution business to improve his difficult financial situation.

loans.name: Carolina Jacqueline

texts.es:
La socia Carolina  pertenece al banco comunal SAN ANTONIO, la socia sigue dedicándose  a su negocio de taller de mantenimiento de carros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia Carolina requiere el préstamo para comprar faros, fundas entre otros.
texts.en:
Carolina is a member of the San Antonio Communal Bank. She continues to manage her auto maintenance business. Carolina appreciates the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. She is a responsible and industrious individual. By working in this manner, she is able to help her family get ahead.

Carolina is requesting a loan in order to buy headlights, seat covers, and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy headlights, seat covers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dinora Elizabeth

texts.es: Dinora de 40 años de edad se dedica desde hace 15 años a la elaboración de antojitos como: papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, etc. que vende cerca de su lugar de residencia, gracias a las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su madre, su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella solicita un crédito para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboración de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, maíz, plátanos y todos los ingredientes para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Dinora is 40 years old. For the past 15 years, she has been preparing street food such as fried potatoes, fried cassava, empanadas, and other snacks and selling them near her place of residence. Thanks to her sales, she is able to cover her household expenses. Dinora lives in her own home along with her mother, her husband, and her two children.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy products that she uses in preparing street food such as oil, potatoes, corn, plantains, and other ingredients. This will help her to generate better earnings.

loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, corn, plantains, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Diana Marcela

texts.es:
Diana, una campesina muy amorosa y de gran pasión por la naturaleza, trabaja con animales, pero no sacrificándolos ni vendiéndolos solamente, trabaja con la leche de las vacas; es tanta la admiración y respeto por los animales que prefiere que mueran por vejez antes de tener que sacrificarles para conseguir una rentabilidad por su carne. 
Es madre de 1 niño de 6 años de edad trabaja con el enseñándole la pasión por el campo, por amar la naturaleza y el amor por los animales. 
Pensando en su vivienda y en su hijo, la señora Diana quiere expandirse y por tal motivo tiene un dinero juntado para comprar una vaca lechera por lo que requiere un crédito para ajustar el dinero suficiente para comprar la vaca pues si abona un capital y queda debiendo el otro los interés serían muy altos y estaría pagando el doble de la vaca. 
Con la ayuda de esta vaca tendrá más producción lechera garantizando una vida económica estable para el futuro de ella y sus hijas. 
Sueña con tener una finca con muchas vacas rodearse de estos mamíferos que le ayudan a llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Diana is a very loving country woman with a great passion for nature.  She works with animals, but does not sacrifice nor solely sell them.  Her work is with the milk of the cows.   So great is her admiration and respect for the animals that she prefers that they die of old age before having to sacrifice them to obtain a profit for the meat.

She is the mother of one six-year-old child.  She works to teach him passion for the countryside, love for nature and love for the animals.

Thinking about her home and her child, Diana wants to expand and for that reason to have the money together to buy a dairy cow. She requires a loan to afford sufficient money to buy the cow, for if she pays on credit and remains owing another, the interest rate would be very high and she would be paying double for the cow. 

With the help of this cow she will have more milk production guaranteeing an economically stable life for the future for herself and her children.  She dreams of having a farm with many cows, surrounding herself with these mammals that help her support her family.

loans.use: to afford to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Luis Arnoldo

texts.es:
Luis, de 66 años de edad, es agricultor, está casado, tiene 3 hijos que trabajan en la agricultura, su esposa se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos. 

Luis, desde su niñez se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz, frijoles y chile en sus parcelas; tambien tiene que cuidar de su ganado.

Hace un tiempo junto a su familia, decidieron sembrar papayas para la venta. 

Luis, solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizante para sus cultivos, de esa manera espera tener una mejor producción.

El sueño de Luis es, en un futuro comprar vacas para procesar más leche y otro tipo de productos lácteos.
texts.en:
Luis, who is 66 years old, is a farmer. He is married and has 3 children who work in agriculture. His wife's work is selling dairy products.

Since his youth, Luis has raised corn, beans, and chiles on his parcels of land. He also has to care for his cattle.

Some time ago, he and his family decided to plant papayas to sell.

Luis is applying for the loan to buy fertilizers for his crops. In this way, he hopes to have a better production.

Luis' dream for the future is to buy cows in order to process more milk and other types of dairy products.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, de 44 años de edad, está casado, tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales solo 2 viven con él; José, solamente cursó el 2º grado, es pescador y su esposa trabaja vendiendo los mariscos que pesca José.

José, aparte de ser pescador y agricultor, también se desempeña como veterinario desde hace 10 años, fue su padre que le enseño ese trabajo.

José, cuando no pesca se traslada a las zonas aledañas a vacunar ganado. 

José, solicita el crédito para comprar cemento, arena y madera para remodelar su vivienda, ya que se encuentra en mal estado y necesita reparación. 

El sueño de José, es mejorar su calidad de vida y tener su propio consultorio de veterinario.
texts.en:
José, who is 44, is married. He has three children, of whom only two live with him. José only completed second grade. He is a fisherman, and his wife works selling the shellfish that José catches.

José, apart from being a fisherman and a farmer, has also worked as a veterinarian for 10 years. It was his father who taught him this work.

José, when he is not fishing, goes to neighboring zones to vaccinate cattle.

José is applying for the loan to purchase cement, sand, and wood to remodel his house, since it is in bad condition and needs repair.

José's dream is to improve his quality of life and have his own veterinary clinic.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and wood to remodel his house.

loans.name: Vilma Esther

texts.es:
Vilma, una madre de 53 años de edad con 2 hijos. Ha podido sostener a su numerosa familia gracias a que trabaja como productora agropecuaria en la finca de sus padres. 
Solicita un crédito para iniciar su propio negocio, una pequeña empresa que iniciaría con pollos los cuales criara y alimentara en los campos que heredo de sus padres, la iniciativa la tomo básicamente por sus hijos porque quiere disfrutar con ellos de una mejor vida, que estudien y que todos los días tengan un motivo para sonreír. 
Apoyen a esta empresaria que quiere demostrar que el papel de madre y padre no le queda pequeño solo necesita tu voto de confianza
texts.en: Vilma, a mother who is 53 and has 2 children.  She has been able to support her large family thanks to doing agricultural work on her parents' farm.  She is requesting a loan to start her own small business raising chickens and feeding them in her parents' fields. She is taking this initiative for her children, so that they can all enjoy a better life, and so they will have a reason to smile every day.  Support this businesswoman who wants to demonstrate that the role of mother and father isn't too small for her.  She just needs your vote of confidence.

loans.use: to start her business in order to have a dignified life and a means of supporting herself.  She will purchase chickens and build a coop to protect them from the elements.

loans.name: Las Azucenas Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo  “Las Azucenas”  la cual está conformada por 08 mujeres emprendedoras y dinámicas. Este es el caso de Madeleine de 19 años de edad es soltera. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir. Hace 03 meses que viene desempeñandose a dicho negocio el cual le va bien. Su mayor deseo es adquirir su propio local ya que asta el momento lo hace ambulatoriamente. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de medias, blusas, polos y camisas. Los integrantes del grupo “Las Azucenas” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el apoyo brindado. Madeleine se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior es la primera del lado derecho y viste vibirí blanco.
texts.en:
This group named “Las Azucenas” (The Lilies) consists of eight enterprising and dynamic women. These qualities describe Madeleine, who is 19 years old and single. She has been selling clothes for the past three months and is doing well in this business. Her greatest wish is to acquire a shop of her own since she currently sells as a street vendor.

Madeleine is requesting a loan in order to buy stockings, blouses, pullovers, and shirts. The group “Las Azucenas” is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the support they have offered. In the photo, Madeleine is standing in the back on the right, wearing a white tank top.

loans.use: to buy stockings, blouses, pullovers, and shirts.

loans.name: Ruth Estela

texts.es:
Ruth en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió iniciar un negocio que según ella le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de La Ceja, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por sus dos hijos y su esposo.

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer e iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de una Colombiana con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Ruth is seeking a more promising future and good opportunities to be able to get ahead. She decided to start a business that according to her will give her everything that she has always dreamed about. She will open a grocery business in her home located in La Ceja, with which she plans to support her family which consists of her two children and husband. Her primary obstacle is the lack of working capital. In order to achieve this she needs help via a loan from Interactuar that will enable her to buy a cooler, shelving, display cases, and a stock of basic products such as groceries, grains, cookies, and other items to stock and start her business.

Support the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian woman with a loan today!

loans.use: to open a grocery store in her home. She wants to buy a cooler, display cases, shelving and a stock of basic items.

loans.name: Huber Alonso

texts.es:
Huber es un hombre de campo y soltero, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.
Desde hace tiempo ha querido montar un negocio de cría y venta de cerdos.

Es por eso que solicita un gran aliento económico para comprar algunos cerdos para cría y materiales para la construcción de una cochera.

Con este nuevo negocio podrá generar ingresos para su familia que es todo para el y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de sus padres.

Trabajara todos los días para impulsar su negocio y hacerlo una actividad sostenible y rentable.

Apoya a un hombre trabajador con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Huber is a man of the countryside, and he is single. Nevertheless, he has always had the strength to get ahead and to continue making progress with his family. For some time, he has wanted to set up a business of raising and selling pigs.

It is for this that he is applying for great economic support to buy some pigs to raise and materials to construct a shed.

With this new business, he will be able to generate income for his family, which is everything for him, and he will be able to improve the quality of life of his parents.

He will work every day to push his business forward and to make it a sustainable and profitable activity.

Help a hard-working man with a loan!

loans.use: to begin a business of raising and selling pigs. He also needs materials to construct a shed.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
El señor Jose es un hombre muy emprendedor y creativo, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de tienda de abarrotes

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que él salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán su esposa y sus hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar surtido de abarrotes, estanterías y vitrinas.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a un veterano lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en: Jose is a very entrepreneurial and creative man.  He has wanted to start his own business for a long time and have his own general store.  He is now able to make his dream a reality thanks to his capacity for hard work, the support he receives from Interactuar and the people who want him to succeed with his business.  He will support his wife and children with this business, and he wants to teach them the business and leave them a legacy. He is requesting a loan to buy a selection of groceries, shelves, and display cases.  With this loan you can support a veteran full of life and spirit for his family.

loans.use: to start a business that will support his family.  He will buy display cases, a freezer, refrigerator, and assorted groceries.

loans.name: Rodemiro

texts.es:
Rodemiro tiene 36 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y su hijo en casa propia de material rústico en el Distrito de Santo Tomás, Provincia de Cutervo, Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café de la variedad catimore desde hace 2 años, su cultivo esta ubicado cerca a su vivienda, adicionalmente tiene sembrado yuca y maíz. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar un adecuado mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto Rodemiro espera mejorar la calidad del café que ofrecerá a sus clientes lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su nivel de ventas y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rodemiro is 36 years old and lives with his wife and child in their own home made of basic materials. They reside in the District of Santo Tomás in Cutervo Province, which is in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The residents of this district engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and trade as their main business activities.

Rodemiro is a farmer who specializes in growing coffee of the Catimor variety. He has been doing this for two years. His crops are located near his home. In addition, he grows cassava and corn. Rodemiro has experience in this business and has good personal and work-related references who are from this area.

His current loan will be used to buy compost and fertilizers so that he can provide adequate maintenance for his coffee crop. With this loan, Rodemiro hopes to improve the quality of the coffee that he offers to his customers. This will have a great impact on the level of his sales, which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers so that he can adequately maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Diana Silvia

texts.es:
Diana Silvia tiene 51 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo e hijos en casa propia en una comunidad del distrito de Cayaltí, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Las actividades económicas que se desarrollan principalmente son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la actividad de crianza y venta de animales como gallinas, patos, cuyes, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos. Con esto Diana Silvia espera hacer crecer su negocio y ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes satisfaciendo de esta manera sus gustos y preferencias lo que le generará mayores ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Diana Silvia is 51 years old. She is married. She lives with her husband and children in their own house in a community in the district of Cayaltí, located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. The economic activities that take place there are principally agriculture, livestock raising, and business.

She works in the business of raising and selling animals such as chickens, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others. Her business is located at her home. She has more than 10 years of experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the zone. She will use the loan that will be granted to her for the purchase of a greater quantity of animals, as well as for the purchase of balanced feed to fatten then. With this, Diana Silvia hopes to make her business grow and to offer a greater variety of animals to her customers, in this way satisfying their tastes and preferences, which will generate more income for her and will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals as well as to buy balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Armando es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.
Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales. 
Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.
 El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de dos vacas lecheras que le de un buen impulso a su negocio.

Apoya a Armando y a su progreso con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Working in the fields is one of the most difficult jobs there is today. It takes a great amount of effort to make progress, but Armando is a man who has never given up despite the weather or the circumstances that happen around him. He is always willing to secure resources for his family.

Armando wakes up early in the morning so that he can travel to different farms in order to fulfill is work obligations. He divides his time between this job and selling milk that he obtains from his own cows.

Armando wants to increase his operating capital so that he can guarantee that his businesses can continue. For this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of two dairy cows. This will provide a great boost to his business.

Support Armando and his progress with a loan!

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows so that he can improve his financial situation.

loans.name: Yana

texts.es:
Yana tiene 38 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, de la costa norte del Perú. La población de dicha zona se dedica principalmente a la crianza y comercio de animales menores y al cultivo de arroz y algodón.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallos, pollos, gallinas, entre otros, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de más animales como gallinas, pollos, cuyes, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Yana espera tener mayor productividad en su negocio lo que le permitirá satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y por ende incrementará su nivel de ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yana is 38 years old and is married. She lives with her husband and her children in the rural part of the district of Oyotún, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru. The inhabitants of the area work mainly raising and selling small animals and growing rice and cotton.

Yana works raising and selling animals like ducks, roosters, chickens and chicks amongst others. She has more than 10 years experience in the business and regular clients who provide her with very good personal and work references.

She is requesting a loan to buy more animals like chickens, chicks and guinea pigs amongst others to increase the stock of her business. Doing this Yana hopes to have higher productivity with her business. This will allow her to satisfy the needs of her clients and in the end increase her level of income and improve her quality of living.

loans.use: to buy more animals like chickens, chicks, guinea pigs amongst others to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Vallecito Group

texts.es:
La socia Justa pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO, la socia tiene 41 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias  con su negocio de elaboración de artesanía ,la socia elabora tejidos como chompas,chalinas,chuyos entre otros, la socia se siente feliz por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio ,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales para su negocio como lana de alpaca.
Este crédito pertenece a una de las líneas de crédito de la Asociación Arariwa su nombre es crediyapa.
texts.en:
Justa is a member of the Communal Bank “Vallecito”. She is 41 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children. Justa divides her time between her daily activities and her business of making handicrafts. She produces knitted articles such as sweaters, scarves, caps, and other items. Justa is pleased with the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. She has been in this business for years and is doing well thanks to the efforts she puts into her work. By working in this manner, she is able to help her family get ahead.

Justa is requesting a loan in order to buy materials for her business, such as alpaca wool. This loan is one of the credit products offered by Asociacion Arariwa known as “Credi Yapa”.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business, such as alpaca wool.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió iniciar un negocio que según ella le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de Medellin, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por su hijo de 11 años y su esposo.

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer e iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de una Colombiana con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Claudia, in her search for a promising future and some good opportunities to move forward, decided to begin a business that according to her will give her all that she has always dreamed of.

She will set up a grocery store business in her house in the municipality of Medellin with which she plans to support her family that is composed of her 11-year-old-son and her husband.

Her main difficulty is the lack of working capital.

In order to succeed she needs the help of a loan with the Interactuar Company that permits her to buy a cooler, shelves, showcases, and assorted basic products of the weekly shopping basket such as groceries, grains, cookies and other foods to begin and supply her business.

Support the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian woman with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy grains, cookies, groceries and the rest of the foods to supply her business

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахиме 54 года. Она уроженка района Гиссар. В поисках источника дохода она начинает свой бизнес. Рахима планирует начать бизнес по продажам одежд. Она будет продавать одежду в селах и близлежащих деревнях. У нее взрослые дети, которые тоже будут помогать матери в ее новом бизнесе. Однако для достижения цели Рахима имеет недостаточный капитал и поэтому запрашивает кредит. На сумму кредита она собирается приобрести зимнюю одежду для перепродажи. Благодаря данному бизнесу она будет получать доход и сможет улучшить уровень жизни семьи. Поддержите Рахиму в ее начинаниях.
texts.en: Rahima is 54 years old.  She is a native of the Gissar district.  In search of a source of income, she is starting her own business.  Rahima is planning to start selling clothes and will be selling her merchandise locally and in the surrounding villages.  She has some adult children who will also be helping her to run her new business.  However, Rahima doesn't have enough capital to achieve her goals.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan.  She is planning to use the amount of her loan to buy winter clothes for resale.  Thanks to this business, she will be making an income and will be able to improve her family's living conditions.  Please support Rahima in her endeavors.

loans.use: to buy various winter clothes for resale.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO , él banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Sabina alterna sus actividades diarias a  tejer chompas para sus clientes que le solicitan como familiares, amistades entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le ponme cada día a su negocio, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de lanas entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the VALLECITO Village Bank. The bank is located in the Department of Cusco. The member Sabina alternates her daily activities from knitting sweaters for the customers that order them from her like family, friends, among others. The member feels thankful for the loan granted and commits herself to fulfilling the established payments. The member has had a lot of time with her business, which is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts forth every day to her business, this being the manner in which the member gets her family ahead.

The member is applying for the loan for the purchase of fabric, among others.

loans.use: to purchase wool, among others.

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia Maria Antonieta  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,la socia sigue teniendo su restaurant, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Maria Antonieta continues working at the business of selling food. The member continues having her restaurant. The member is an enterprising woman who, by means of this business, wants her children to finish studying. The member's dream is to have a large restaurant. The member is applying for the loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and beef.

The member is happy because of the loan and is committed to fulfilling her payment installments.

loans.use: to buy chicken, vegetables and beef.

loans.name: Kulzina

texts.ru: Кульзина, 49 лет, вдова, мать 5 детей, двое детей живут вместе с Кульзиной. У нее среднее образование, уже много лет она работает уборщицей в местной школе, также занимается сельским хозяйством. У Кульзины есть 4 коровы, 25 овец и 1 лошадь. На участке мерою 6,40 ГА земельной доли, Кульзина выращивает фасоль и клевер для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS), дети помогают Кульзине и по хозяйству, и финансово, однако ей хочется быть самостоятельной и независимой, поэтому она решила дальше развить ее деятельность и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), полученные средства она направит на покупку лошади и жеребца для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита помогут Кульзине улучшить благосостояние ее семьи и отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Kulzina is 49 years old, a widow, and the mother of five children.  Two of her children live with her.  Kulzina has the equivalent of a high school education and she has been working as a cleaning lady in a local school for many years.  She is also involved in agriculture.  She owns four cows, 25 sheep and one horse.  She also grows beans and clover, for resale, on  6.4 hectares of land.  She makes a monthly income of about 7,000 som (KGS).  Her children help her to run the business and also financially.  However, Kulzina would like to be self-sufficient and independent.  For this reason, she has decided to further develop her activity and she has turned to Bai Tushum for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy one horse and one stallion in order to increase her livestock headcount.  The earnings from her loan will help her to improve her family's welfare and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase one horse and one stallion in order to invest in her business and  increase her income.

loans.name: Eucliver

texts.es:
El señor Eucliver desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.
Hoy en día su actividad principal es la piscicultura, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital adecuando un estanque y con la compra de peces para la cria y venta que  abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.
Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.
Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.
Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
From a very young age, Eucliver has performed field activities, such as agriculture and raising livestock. His father taught him this work so that he could move forward. Today, he makes a living primarily in fish farming. His goal is to improve his capital by making a pond and filling it with fish for breeding and sale. He hopes to increase his stock and generate a better income. This is the reason why he is requesting a loan.

He is a responsible and loving father to his children. He lives on a farm with his children and his wife, who has been his greatest companion. He dreams of being able to give his children a quality education so that in the future they can defend themselves and be independent. He attends to his business every day, and he strives to do things well. He knows that with the help of Interactuar he will be able to achieve great things.

loans.use: to make a pond and fill it with fish.

loans.name: Dúo Villa Lobos Ll Group

texts.es: Dúo Villa Lobos ll Este Grupo esta formado por la señora Martha de 54 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones y a la vetna de helados, se ha dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, le da gracias a Dios ya que tiene a su familia que la han apoyado en todo momento, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la elaboracion de refacciones para la venta.
texts.en:
Dúo Villa Lobos ll

Martha, age 54, is a member of this group.  She sells refreshments and ice cream.  She has been engaged in this business activity for several years.  She thanks God because she has her family that has supported her at all times.

This time she is requesting this loan to buy food products to make the refreshments she sells.

loans.use: to buy food products to make the refreshments she sells.

loans.name: Justa

texts.es:
La socia Justa pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO, la socia sigue  con su negocio de elaboración de artesanía, la socia se siente feliz por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua  elaborando  tejidos como chompas, chalinas, chuyos entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Justa belongs to the VALLECITO village bank. The member continues with her business making crafts. The member feels happy because of the loan granted and commits herself to fulfilling her established installments. The member continues making knitted clothes like sweaters, shawls, hats, among others. The member wishes to be able to continue working to continue supporting her family in this manner. 

The member is applying for the loan for the purchase of sweaters, among others.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, among others.

loans.name: Jorge Enrriquez

texts.es:
El socio Jorge Enrriquez  se dedica al negocio de restaurant, el socio realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es tener un restaurant.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.



El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jorge Enrriquez runs a restaurant. He makes different dishes such as baked chicken, soups, and salted meats. He works from 8am to 6pm. He has been working in this field for 8 years and things are going very well for him.  His dream is to have a more successful restaurant.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken. 

He is happy at the prospect of a loan and promises to comply with the repayment quotas.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Es una comunidad cuya población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, patos, cuyes, pollos, entre otros, así como a la venta de los mismos. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo solicitado será para la construcción de corrales (lugar donde cría a sus animales) así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de sus animales. Con esto Teofilo espera mejorar la productividad de su negocio lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Teofilo is 51 years old. He lives with his partner and their children in the Pucará District in the province of Jaén in the Cajamarca region of Peru's northern mountain range. The community's principal economic activities include agriculture, trade and livestock.

Teofilo raises and sells small animals such as chickens, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others. He has experience in business and very good personal and work references in the area. The requested loan will be used to build pens for raising animals and for purchasing nutritional feed to fatten his animals. In this way Teofilo hopes to improve business productivity, which will be reflected in increased income and an improved quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to build pens for raising animals and for purchasing nutritional feed to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.es:
La socia Eliza se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eliza works in clothing sales. She sells pants, blouses and polo shirts. She has many years of experience and is doing very well. Her dream is to run a bazaar. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters and blouses.

Eliza is happy for the loan opportunity and promises to make timely payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy natural health products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy corn and firewood to make tortillas

loans.name: Yaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yaneth, de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está divorciada, tiene una niña de 11 años, quien estudia 6º grado, vive junto a sus padres y una hermana, pero no depende económicamente de ellos. 

Yaneth, a trabajado junto a su padre en la agricultura desde los 15 años, ya que su padre ha sido agricultores de toda la vida, ella aprendió las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz y frijol. 

Actualmente, tiene tres años y medio de tener venta de tortillas, en el cual trabaja junto a su hermana, en el horario de 9:00 a.m a 4:00 p.m de lunes a sábado, de esta actividad dependen sus ingresos.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar materiales de construcción para arreglar su vivienda, ya que existen partes dañadas. De esta forma Yaneth y su familia cumplirán el sueño de tener una vivienda digna.

Yaneth, sueña con tener un terreno propio donde vivir y así dejárselo como herencia a su hija.-  Además, piensa en seguir trabajando para que a su hija no le falte nada y tenga todo lo necesario y lo más importante, que se prepare y termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
32-year-old Yaneth is a divorced high school graduate. She has an 11-year-old daughter that is in 6th grade. She lives with her parents and a sister, but does not depend on them financially.

Yaneth has worked in agriculture with her father since she is 15 years old. Her father has always been a farmer and taught her how to grow corn and beans. 

She has also been selling tortillas for three and a half years. She works with her sister from 9:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m. from Monday to Saturday. Her income depends on this activity.

She will use the loan to buy building materials to fix her house, as some areas are damaged. This will allow Yaneth and her family to achieve their dream or having a decent home. 

Yaneth dreams of having her own plot of land and leave it to her daughter as an inheritance. She also plans on continuing to work so that her daughter has everything she needs and, most importantly, finishes her studies.

loans.use: to buy building materials to fix her house.

loans.name: Dúo Amor De Dios Group

texts.es:
AMOR DE DIOS
Este dúo está conformado por Sandra es originaria de Sumpango y es madre de familia,ella tiene su negocio de elaboracion de tortillas, Sandra se dedica a vender tortillas tambien tiene la venta de perfumes todos los días sale a ofrecer productos de catalogo pero el deseo de ella es tener un puesto propio para ya no salir a las calles a ofrecer ya que la delincuencia a aumentado y cada vez es más complicado vender en las calles, es por eso que solicita un crédito para poder invertir en su negocio de venta de tortillas y en la venta de perfumes(cosmeticos)
texts.en: Sandra formed the "Love of God" duo. She is a native of Sumpango and a mother. Her business is making tortillas. She sells her tortillas and also sells perfumes. Every day, she goes out to sell products from a catalog. She wants to have her own place of business so that she doesn't have to go out on the streets, given that crime is increasing and selling in the streets is becoming more complicated. She is asking for a loan to be able to invest in her tortilla and perfume/cosmetics business.

loans.use: purchase corn and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María es una mujer casada de 27 años de edad, vive en una comunidad muy bonita llamada  San Andrés Semetabaj al lado de su esposo. 
María es una mujer que con esmero y dedicación logro terminar sus estudios,  con la ayuda de sus padres,  ella ahora trabaja como cajera en una agencia bancaria de su comunidad,  desde hace un año, ella se siente dichosa porque de  esa manera con sus ingresos que genera puede aportar en lo necesario para su hogar.  Son muchas las expectativas de esta mujer,  ella cuenta con una casa pero le hace falta que equipar, pues ella anhela comprar muebles para su casa, pero no cuenta con dinero para hacerlo, pues para lograr esta meta, ella solicita un prestamo de cinco mil quetzales y con lo que genera en su trabajo va pagando el prestamo. Para María  los préstamos son  peldaños que nos vienen  a apoyar para cubrir otras necesidades. María quiere hacer realidad sus sueños, y tiene esperanzas de conseguir el prestamo.
texts.en:
27-year old María is married and lives with her husband in the very attractive community of San Andrés Semetabaj.

Through hard work and dedication María managed to complete her education with help from her parents. For the last year she has worked as a teller in a local bank. She feels happy as the income she earns can help provide essentials for the household. 

María has many hopes for the future. She has a house but it needs equipping. She longs to buy furniture but can’t afford it. In order to achieve her goal she is seeking a loan of 5,000 quetzales which she will pay back with the money she earns.

For María loans are steps that can be used to pay for necessities. She wishes to fulfill her dreams and hopes that she will obtain a loan.

loans.use: buy furniture for her house

loans.name: Maria Estefana

texts.es:
María Estéfana
Es originaria del área de san Martin Jilotepeque actualmente tiene 45 años de edad y desde hace más de diez años se ha dedicado a la compra y venta de gallinas y pollos está bien agradecida con Fape y Kiva por el apoyo que han brindado a su empresa ya que está logrando su sueño de tener más ganancias debido a la inversión que está haciendo y esto le ha beneficiado a su familia porque  tienen una mejor calidad de vida. Su puesto lo tiene en el exterior del mercado municipal y es allí donde sus clientas la buscan para comprar las gallinas. Sus pagos han sido bien puntuales y ella es una persona responsable. Solicita el crédito para la compra de mas gallinas y concentrado.
texts.en:
María Estéfana is native to the area of St. Martin Jilotepeque in Guatemala. She is 45 years old. For more than ten years she has worked buying and selling chickens. She is grateful to Kiva and Kiva partner Fape for their support to her business. Loans are helping her to achieve her dream of increased earnings, thus improving her family's quality of life.

María Estéfana's stand is on the outside of the city market. This is where clients look for her to buy chickens. She is a responsible person and her loan payments have been on time. She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.use: to purchase animals for sale.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia Graciela pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO, la  socia continua dedicándose a su  negocio de librería, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua vendiendo lapiceros, papel entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuadernos, folders, papel entre otros.
texts.en: Graciela is a member of the Vallecito communal bank.  She continues to make a living with her stationary business.  She feels grateful for the loan that she received and promises to complete the payment of her installments.  She continues selling pens, notebooks, and other items to all of her clients who seek them.  She wants to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, folders, and paper, among other things.

loans.name: Comuzone Iv Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “COMUZONE IV”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita ella es viuda y tiene 63 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos terminen de estudiar, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.

Las socias que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de imprenta.
texts.en:
Members belong to the “COMUZONE IV” communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and Cusco state.

Margarita is 63 years old and a widow. She has a business selling groceries. She sells basic staple items such as rice, sugar, milk and oil. Through this business she wants to pay for her children to finish school. She works from 8 AM until 6 PM. She has had this business for one year and it is going very well for her. She dreams of expanding her grocery business. She seeks a loan to buy milk, sugar, oil and rice.

The members inserted into the group photo had their picture taken after the meeting, with permission, because of their work. The other members of the group work selling clothing, selling woven goods, a grocery store and a printing business.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil and rice.

loans.name: El Manantial De Pariachi Group

texts.es: El grupo “El Manantial De Pariachi” está conformado por 05 socios solidarios y responsables. Este es el caso de Noemí de 42 años de edad es separada con 03 hijos dependientes.  Ella  se dedica a la venta de jugos (juguería). Tiene buena acogida por sus clientes por ser temporada de verano. Su mayor deseo es contar con su propio local, ya que lo viene alquilando hasta el momento. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de naranja, papaya y plátanos. El grupo “El Manantial De Pariachi” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el crédito brindado y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Noemí es la segunda del lado derecho y viste polo rosado.
texts.en: The “El Manantial de Pariachi” comunal bank is made up of five responsible and caring members.  This is also true of Noemí, who is 42 years old, separated, and has three dependent children.  She makes a living selling juice.  She is well received by her customers because it is the summer season.  Her greatest wish is to have her own shop, as she has been renting so far.  The loan that she requested will be set aside to purchase oranges, papayas, and bananas.  The “El Manantial de Pariachi” communal bank is thankful for the Kiva investors for the loan that they are granting and promise to continue working hard.  Noemí is the second one from the right, wearing the pink shirt.

loans.use: to purchase oranges, papayas, and bananas

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en:
Gerry is a hollow-block manufacturer. He produces and sells hollow blocks. He is married man with four kids. His oldest child is 12 and the youngest is 6. He has been engaged in producing hollow blocks for two years.  In addition to that, he also engages in farming. Together with his family, he lives in Mcarthur, Leyte.

He is asking for a loan to buy 100 bags of cement and other supplies.  These supplies are very essential in making more hollow blocks to resell. With these, he could slowly improve his earnings and start to become stable. He can now set aside some profit to venture into any possible business.

In the future, Gerry would like to expand his business to support all of his children's education.

loans.use: to buy 100 bags of cement and other supplies

loans.name: Xenia Roxana

texts.es:
La socia Xenia Roxana  pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO, la socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de frutas y verduras, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua vendiendo zanahorias, plátanos entre otros  a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de platanos, naranjas entre otros.
texts.en:
Xenia Roxana is a member of the communal bank Vallecito. She continues working in her business selling fruits and vegetables. She is pleased with the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

Xenia Roxana continues selling carrots, plantains, and other items. She is a responsible and dedicated person, and that is how she moves her family ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy plantains, oranges, and other fruits.

loans.use: to buy plantains, oranges, and other fruits.

loans.name: Yessica Noelia

texts.es: Jessica una joven de 27 años de edad que estudia la carrera de educación inicial. Ella ha logrado obtener buenas calificaciones en sus estudios. Actualmente labora en un centro de educación y al cuidado de niños. Su mayor deseo es terminar satisfactoriamente sus estudios y de esta manera poder insertarse al mercado laboral. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para el pago de su pensión y materiales de estudio. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por apoyar a jóvenes con ella.
texts.en:
Jessica is 27 years old and is studying for a degree in elementary education. She has achieved good grades in her studies. She currently works in an education center and cares for children. Her greatest desire is to finish her studies satisfactorily and in this way be able to enter the labor market.

The loan that she requested will be used to pay for her housing and study materials. She is thankful to the Kiva lenders for supporting young people with her.

loans.use: to pay for her housing and study materials.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is 41 years old, married and she has five children. 

Adelina has been involved in business activities since 2006, when she started with her own working capital of $600. Adelina has a shop for her business. She is earning a good income from her business because she is selling general goods that many people like to buy. So she is still happy to do her business. She also has animals like cows, pigs, chickens, goats and dogs.

Adelina is applying for a loan of $1,500 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She is taking this loan because she wants to buy additional supplies to keep in her store including shoes, bags, umbrellas, clothes and other things to sell.

loans.use: To buy shoes, bags, umbrellas, clothes and other things to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase chickens and sell the meat

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan se dedica desde hace 25 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y maicillo, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa en casa propia, Juan está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: For 25 years, Juan has made a living in agriculture.  He sows corn and sorghum and sells his products in the different markets that are located near his house.  He lives with his wife in his own house.  Juan is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, man-made and organic fertilizers, pesticide, etc., and to improve the land pictured in the photo, in order to continue with his work and to have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, man-made and organic fertilizers, pesticide, etc., and to improve his land

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde hace 15 años a la venta de tortillas, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro perimetral en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así ella y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Cristina is 62 years old and lives in her own home with her family. For the past 15 years she has sold tortillas. She gets by with the money she earns from her sales. 

She wants to improve her home by building a outer wall in the area that you can see in the photo.  However, she doesn't have sufficient capital and this is why she is seeking a loan. She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, and to pay for manual labor.  This is how she and her family will live more comfortably and safer.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Oscar Oliberto

texts.es: Oscar de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee un carwash desde hace 15 años ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes, el quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando las puertas ya que están hechas de madera, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo, por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de puertas, balcones y pago de mano de obra y asi el y su esposa pueden vivir más seguros.
texts.en:
Oscar is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. For the past 15 years he has owned a car wash, which is located close to his home.  He has many customers.

He wants to improve his home by changing the doors, which are currently made of wood. However, with the money he makes from his job, he is unable to buy the new doors.  This is why he is seeking a loan. He will buy doors, security screens, and pay for manual labor. This is how he and his wife will be able to live more securely.

loans.use: to buy doors, security screens, and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO , él banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Silvia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de artesanía, la socia vende mantas, mochilas entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan  como familiares, amistades entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le ponme cada día a su negocio, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mochilas entre otros.
texts.en: Silvia belongs to the communal bank Vallecito, which is located in the Cusco department. As well as her regular daily activities, Silvia has a business buying and selling handicrafts. She sells blankets and backpacks among other items to her customers, which include family members and friends. Silvia is grateful for the loan and is committed to making the agreed payments. Silvia has been working in this business for a long time, and is successful because of the hard work that she puts into her work every day, since this is how she provides for her family. Silvia is requesting the loan to buy backpacks and other items.

loans.use: to buy backpacks and other goods.

loans.name: Ran's Group

texts.en:
Ran’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. 

Ran makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Yoeunr's Group

texts.en:
Yoeunr’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Yoeunr makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a factory labourer and construction worker to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Roeun's Group

texts.en:
Roeun’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Roeun makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a village coordinator to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their families

loans.name: Josue Nehemias

texts.es:
Josué, de 30 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado desde hace 12 años, tiene dos hijos, los dos estudiaran este año 2015, su esposa se dedica al cuido de sus hijos y de animales domésticos que cría para tener unos ingresos más adelante, la familia la conforman solo cuatro personas.

Josué, es agricultor, dicho trabajo lo ha realizado desde la edad de 7 años de edad, dejó la escuela por trabajar en la tierra, pero ahora tiene seis meses de trabajar en una empresa de seguridad y tiene que viajar todos los días 10 kilómetros, pero el sacrificio es porque existe un ingreso seguro todos los meses, lo que significa que sus hijos tengan acceso al seguro social de salud. 

Josué, necesita el dinero para comprar una motocicleta, que le servirá para trasladarse al trabajo, ya que por su horario de trabajo, casi siempre tiene que caminar mucho porque a veces no hay transporte.   

El sueño de Josué es, establecer una base económica para que sus hijos estudien en la universidad.
texts.en:
30-year-old Josue studied up until the sixth grade. He has been married for 12 years and has two children, both of whom are in school. His wife takes care of the children and of the domestic animals that they raise to have an extra income later. The family is composed of four people.

Josue is a farmer. He started working in this field since he was seven years old. He left school to work the land. He has, however, been working for six months in a security company and has to travel 10km every day. Even though there is some degree of sacrifice, he does it because there is a secure income every month and his children have access to health insurance. 

Josue needs to money to buy a motorcycle, which he will use to commute to work. Because of his work schedule, he must almost always walk a great deal, as there is often no public transportation. 

Josue's dream is to establish a solid economic base so that his children can go to university.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more tires and springs in bulk

loans.name: Keang's Group

texts.en:
Keang’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Keang makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Sreung's Group

texts.en:
Sreung’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sreung makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Bazarsad

texts.en: Bazarsad, 41, lives with his wife and two children in Kherlen, the eastern-most town in Mongolia. He has been working as driver at a private company and during his days off he operates a taxi service for local people in order to generate extra income. His eldest son graduated from his university last year and now works for a mining company. The house his family lives in has deteriorated over the years and needs some renovation. So Bazarsad is requesting a loan of 1,850 USD to buy building materials, such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam, for his house renovation. After the renovation is complete, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and therefore less pollutants will be released into the air.

loans.use: to renovate his house in order to burn less coal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pesticides, etc., and to prepare the land.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia Julia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO ,la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de compra y venta de granos secos como trigo,maiz,kinua entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua comprando su mercadería en Ocongate para vender a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de granos.
texts.en:
This member, Julia, belongs to the Vallecito communal bank. She continues working on her business of buying and selling dry grains such as wheat, corn and quinoa, among others. She is thankful for the loan granted and is committed to fulfilling her set payments. She still buys her merchandise in Ocongate to sell to all the customers who ask. She hopes to be able to continue working and in that way, to continue supporting her family. 

The associate is requesting the loan to buy grains.

loans.use: to buy grains.

loans.name: Cem's Group

texts.en:
Cem’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Cem makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Yeng's Group

texts.en:
Yeng’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Yeng makes kroma (Bokator, martial art scarves) and he also does extra work as a house repairer to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Keat's Group

texts.en:
Keat’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Keat makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work both as a factory labourer and selling traditional clothes to support her family. 

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel to boil water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de pescado desde hace 8 años de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonia con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante, al joven vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pescado por mayor y así continuar con sus ventas para tener mejores ganancias y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This young woman's face has been blurred because she is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk area. For 8 years, she has made a living selling fish as a street vendor in different communities. With her sales, she manages to get ahead. This young woman lives in her own house with her life partner. She is requesting a loan to buy more fish at wholesale so she can continue selling and have more income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more fish at wholesale.

loans.name: Tsetsegmaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Tsetsegmaa, who is 30 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Kherlen, the easternmost town of Mongolia. She has been working as a cook at a waste recycling company since 2006. Her husband is currently unemployed and stays at home looking after their children. Her sister, who studies at the university in Ulaanbaatar hasn't paid her tuition fees and it has become an urgent issue. 

So Tsetsegmaa is requesting a loan of $1,050 USD to pay the tuition fees for her sister's education. If her sister successfully graduates from her university and secures a job, Tsetsegmaa will no longer have to worry about her.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for her sister

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quein se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales de elotes de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, la joven vive en casa propia con su esposo ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de elotes por mayor, leche, azúcar, etc. para continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: This young woman's face has been blurred because she is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk area. She makes and sells corn tamales for a living as a street vendor in various communities. With what she obtains from her sales, she manages to get ahead. This young woman lives in her own house with her husband. She is requesting a loan to buy corn at wholesale, milk, sugar, etc., in order to continue with her sales and thus have more income.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 28 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, estudió hasta bachillerato opción secretariado, está soltera, pero tiene un novio que está viviendo en Estados Unidos, con el cual espera formar un hogar cuando él regrese, no tiene hijos y vive en casa propia, junto con sus dos padres y sus siete hermanos, de los cuales solo 3 trabajan y los otros están estudiando. Sus padres tienen un negocio de venta de helados de forma ambulante.

Elizabeth, actualmente trabaja en una tienda de eventos festivos.- Cuando termino el bachillerato, trabajó en un negocio de fotocopias y venta de papelería ubicado a las afueras de una universidad, mientras trabaja en ese lugar, solicito un préstamo para adquirir la casa en donde actualmente vive, luego tuvo otros trabajos, en una oficina contable y como secretaria  en un canal de televisión.

El préstamo solicitado es para comprar cemento, arena y piedra, un servicio sanitario y construir un muro al rededor de la casa, para que no ingresen animales ni personas desconocidas a su propiedad.

Los planes que Elizabeth tiene para un futuro es adquirir 2 lotes vecinos, para así tener más espacio donde poder vivir con su familia de manera más confortable, puesto que es bastante numerosa. También aspira con casarse y formar un hogar, viviendo feliz con sus hijos y su esposo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 28 years old and is a hard-working woman. She graduated from high school having followed the secretarial work option. She is not married, but she has a boyfriend who is living in the United States. She hopes to build a home with him when he comes back. She does not have any children and lives in her own home with her parents and her seven brothers and sisters, of whom three have jobs and the others are studying. Her parents have a mobile business selling ice cream.

Elizabeth is currently working in a store that sells items for parties and festivals. After she finished high school, she worked in a photocopying and stationery store located on the outskirts of a university. While she was working there, she requested a loan to buy the house where she currently lives. After that, she had other jobs in a accounting office and as a secretary at a TV channel.

She is requesting the loan in order to buy cement, sand, stone, a toilet, and to build a wall around her home, to prevent animals and strangers from entering her property. 

Elizabeth's plans for the future are to acquire the two adjoining lots to her property so that her family have more space and can live more comfortably, as the family is large. She also hopes to get married and to start a family, living happily with her children and her husband.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and stone, a toilet, and to build a wall around her house.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a married woman from Dulag, Leyte. She is a 38-year-old woman with four children. Her oldest child is 17 and the youngest is two years of age.  She engages in the buying and selling of scrap materials such as iron, steel, empty plastic bottles and other recycled materials. 

Emma has requested a loan to purchase more supplies of scrap galvanized iron, steel and other materials. These materials will help augment her income. Thus, more scrap materials will accumulate, and more of it will be sold to a junk shop. In the long run, Emma would like to start to manage her finances and provide her children with nutritious diets.

Emma is hoping that with the additional capital, she will be able to properly expand her business in order to support the education of her children and provide them with better living conditions as well.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies of scrap galvanized iron, steel and many other materials

loans.name: Sagynbubu

texts.ru: Сагынбубу, 46 лет, замужем, есть сын, ему 24 года. У Сагынбубу высшее образование, работает учителем начальных классов. Также в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1994 году. Благодаря упорному труду, Сагынбубу на сегодняшний день имеет 4 коровы, 15 овец, 1 лошадь, 3 козы, 1 жеребца. Муж Сагынбубу занимается частным извозом, сын работает строителем. Ежемесячная заработная плата Сагынбубу составляет около 13,000 сом (KGS), прибыль от ведения бизнеса - 5,000 сом (KGS). Она в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Сагынбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, что позволит построить сарай для скота и в будущем накопить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en:
Sagynbubu is 46 years old, married, and the mother of a 24-year old son. Sagynbubu is a college graduate; she works as a primary school teacher. As an additional source of income for her family, she raises livestock and grows farm produce, having launched this business in 1994. Thanks to Sagynbubu's hard work, she now owns four cows, 15 sheep, one horse, three goats and one colt. Sagynbubu's husband works as a private taxi driver. Her son works in construction. Sagynbubu's monthly salary is about 13,000 KGS; her revenue from her farm is about 5,000 KGS. In order to develop her farm further, 

Sagynbubu has turned to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy young bulls for fattening and resale. Sagynbubu plans to invest her revenues in a further expansion of her farm, which will allow her to build an animal shed and eventually save up for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy bull calves for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Undarmaa

texts.en: Mrs. Undarmaa, 33 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She and her husband have been running a furniture-making business since 2006. Their children go to a local school. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy wood, planks and luster in large quantities in order to expand her business. In the last two years, she hired two people for furniture making, creating jobs and improving the local economy.

loans.use: to buy raw materials in order to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy  sugar, coffee, cooking oils, toothbrushes, sardines, milks, tea, salts and other things to sell.

loans.name: Concisa

texts.en: Concisa is 59 years old. She is known in the Katipunan, Zambo Del Norte area for her sari-sari store. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the co-op offers. She hopes to live comfortably with a decent house, so she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. In the future, Concisa hopes to purchase land to cultivate for added income.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for house repair

loans.name: Dorothea

texts.en: Dorothea is 60 years old and resides in the Island of Siquijor. She joined PMPC on April 17, 2009 in order to access the programs and services of said coop. She is accessing her second loan in the amount of PHP 5,000 to buy a variety of commodities for her existing business, which sells a variety of food products in the local community.

loans.use: to buy a variety of commodities

loans.name: Ankhbayar

texts.en: Mrs. Ankhbayar, 31 years old, lives with her husband, three children and mother-in-law in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been selling vegetables since 2000. Her daughter goes to high school, her son goes to kindergarten and her youngest son is looked after by her mother-in-law. She is requesting a loan of 2,075 USD to buy vegetables such as potatoes, carrots and cabbages in large quantity in order to store them in warehouse for later sale. This business is the main income generator for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in large quantities.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna operates a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various items like bread, biscuits, noodles, eggs, cooking oil, coffee, toothpaste, bath soap and canned goods. She is a 42-year-old married woman with seven children. Three of her children are still attending school. She has been running a store for 10 years now.

Edna is asking for a loan to buy assorted goods like canned goods, beverages, condiments and toiletries. This stock is very helpful in attracting more buyers to purchase. With this, slowly, her earnings will improved. She can provide her family with nutritious meals and better shelter to live. She would exert effort to become progressive in handling her current business for the welfare of her family.
